entry.title: Minecraft - HermitCraft S9#12: Ice Road Truckers

media:group.media:title: Minecraft - HermitCraft S9#12: Ice Road Truckers
media:group.media:description:
Gunpowder supplies are running low so it is time to setup a creeper farm. Then we head out to the boat race track and try improve things with various details.

media:group.media:description:
Minecraft 1.20 Trails & Tales update is here! Today we focus on going around exploring and collecting all the new stuff added into Minecraft.

entry.title: Etho's Modded Minecraft S2 #12: Satchel of Snacks

media:group.media:title: Etho's Modded Minecraft S2 #12: Satchel of Snacks
media:group.media:description:
Enough is enough! 12 episodes in is far too long to go without getting some decent enchantments. However, resources are running low, so we head out to do some caving. Then we look into the idea of setting up a crazy factory.
Minecraft: v1.16.5 Seed: -8643623643821936147 Shaders: Complementary Shaders (v4.7)
Main Mods Used: Forge, AdHooks, AlexsMobs, AppleSkin, Aquaculture, ArchitectsPalette, Atmospheric, Autumnity, BagOfYurting, BambooBlocks, BetterEndForge, BetterMineshafts, BiomesOPlenty, Botania, BuzzierBees, CosmicNPCs, CraftingTweaks, Create, CustomNPCs, Cyclic, DarkerDepths, DarkUtilities, DecorativeBlocks, DungeonsGear, DungeonsMobs, DungeonsPlus, DynamicSurroundings, EnchantWithMob, Endergetic, EndRemasteredForge, EnhancedMushrooms, EntityCulling, Environmental, FallingLeaves, FarmersDelight, FerriteCore, FinsAndTails, FramedBlocks, GoblinTraders, Gravestone, GuardVillagers, HandCannon, ImmersiveEngineering, ImmersivePetroleum, InfernalExpansion, InventoryPets, JEI, JER, Journeymap, MarketCrates, Mekanism, MoreMinecarts, Neapolitan, NethersDelight, OptiFine, PneumaticCraftRepressurized, PSI, RemovePotionsIcons, Quark, SavageAndRavage, SophisticatedBackpacks, Spiders2.0, StorageDrawers, Supplementaries, Tetra, Turtlemancy, TwilightForest, UntamedWilds, UpgradeAquatic, ValhelsiaStructures, VisualWorkbench
Note: Many of these mods also require additional library mods not mentioned. Forge should give you a list of these needed when you start up the game.
I want to give a special thanks to the mod makers and the modding community for all your excellent hard work.

entry.title: Etho Plays Minecraft - Episode 579: System Startup

media:group.media:title: Etho Plays Minecraft - Episode 579: System Startup
media:group.media:description:
Today we go for a big push to get the Villager Trading system finished and the Ultimate Enchanting system. Then we run through how it works and the startup process we need to follow for the first time running it.

entry.title: Etho Plays Minecraft - Episode 578: Splash Auto Farmer

media:group.media:title: Etho Plays Minecraft - Episode 578: Splash Auto Farmer
media:group.media:description:
The EnderEnder 3.0 is overdue for an upgrade, so we experiment with a method of killing mobs automatically using splash potions. The Ultimate Enchanting system gets its looks figured out. We also get started with the new 1.19.4 horse breeding mechanics.

entry.title: Etho Plays Minecraft - Episode 577: Fun, Exciting, & Dangerous

media:group.media:title: Etho Plays Minecraft - Episode 577: Fun, Exciting, & Dangerous
media:group.media:description:
Today we finish up most of the redstone on the Ultimate Enchanting System. We dredge through the villagers until we have a near perfect Librarian trading haul setup. We experiment with using Withers to mine deepslate for us. Then finally, Sandy City gets it's last main building put in.
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/EthoLP TwitchTV: http://www.twitch.tv/ethotv/ World Download (550): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aJ6we_pq1pqU_4ofgXD3ACfEGasBNBQn/view?usp=sharing
Reminder: People advertising, spamming, or being rude in the channel comments will be blocked.

media:group.media:title: Minecraft - Limited Life #8: Betrayal & Loyalty
media:group.media:description:
Limited Life is an odd mix of a Social and PvP Minecraft game started by Grian. Players are thrown into a tiny world with almost no rules, except survive as long as possible.
Green = 16+ Hours Yellow = 8+ Hours Red = 0+ Hours
Death = Lose 1 Hour Kill = Gain 30 Minutes Boogeyman Death/Kill = Rates Double
Red Players are given the goal of killing all the other players in the game. Yellow players can kill all green player. Each episode Boogeymen are chosen in secret and randomly to kill another player.
Grian: https://www.youtube.com/user/Xelqua Smallishbeans: https://www.youtube.com/user/SmallishBeans Smajor1995: https://www.youtube.com/user/Dangthatsalongname bigbst4tz2: https://www.youtube.com/c/Bigbst4tz22 Bdouble0100: https://www.youtube.com/user/BdoubleO100 InTheLittleWood: https://www.youtube.com/user/inthelittlewoods GoodTimeWithScar: https://www.youtube.com/user/GoodTimesWithScar impulseSV: https://www.youtube.com/user/impulseSV Tango: https://www.youtube.com/user/TangoTekLP ZombieCleo: https://www.youtube.com/user/ZombieCleo SolidarityGaming: https://www.youtube.com/user/SolidarityGaming Skizzleman: https://www.youtube.com/user/MCSkizzleman PearlescentMoon: https://www.youtube.com/c/PearlescentMoon
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/EthoLP TwitchTV: http://www.twitch.tv/ethotv/
#limitedlife #etho #minecraft

media:group.media:title: Minecraft - HermitCraft S9#10: Alien Insides
media:group.media:description:
This episode is too long! Today we check out the interior building style for the alien/organic base. We make some music with Zedaph that absolutely blasts. We check out some new features with the big boat race. Then it is Total Chaos time as we face Beef in the quarterfinals of the TCG tournament.
Note Block Song: Tchaikovsky - 1812 Overture
Zedaph: https://www.youtube.com/@Zedaph Cubfan: https://www.youtube.com/@cubfan Beef: https://www.youtube.com/@VintageBeef Docm: https://www.youtube.com/@docm77 Rendog: https://www.youtube.com/@rendog
HermitCraft Website: http://www.hermitcraft.com
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/EthoLP TwitchTV: http://www.twitch.tv/ethotv/
#hermitcraft #etho #minecraft

entry.title: Etho's Modded Minecraft S2 #11: Fishing Shack

media:group.media:title: Etho's Modded Minecraft S2 #11: Fishing Shack
media:group.media:description:
Today we work at expanding our starter town by adding a new Dock & Fishing Shack onto the beach area. Then we test it out with some riveting fishing from the Aquaculture 2 mod.
Minecraft: v1.16.5 Seed: -8643623643821936147 Shaders: Complementary Shaders (v4.7)

entry.title: Minecraft - Limited Life #4: Green Hunting Day

media:group.media:title: Minecraft - Limited Life #4: Green Hunting Day
media:group.media:description:
Limited Life is an odd mix of a Social and PvP Minecraft game started by Grian. Players are thrown into a tiny world with almost no rules, except survive as long as possible.
Green = 16+ Hours Yellow = 8+ Hours Red = 0+ Hours
Death = Lose 1 Hour Kill = Gain 30 Minutes Boogeyman Death/Kill = Rates Double
Red Players are given the goal of killing all the other players in the game. Yellow players can kill all green player. Each episode Boogeymen are chosen in secret and randomly to kill another player. If they fail to do so, they will lose all except 1 of their lives in the next episode.

media:group.media:title: Minecraft - Limited Life #3: 2 Hours 2 Diamonds
media:group.media:description:
Limited Life is an odd mix of a Social and PvP Minecraft game started by Grian. Players are thrown into a tiny world with almost no rules, except survive as long as possible.
Green = 16+ Hours Yellow = 8+ Hours Red = 0+ Hours
Death = Lose 1 Hour Kill = Gain 30 Minutes Boogeyman Death/Kill = Rates Double
Red Players are given the goal of killing all the other players in the game. Yellow players can kill all green player. Each episode Boogeymen are chosen in secret and randomly to kill another player. If they fail to do so, they will lose all except 1 of their lives in the next episode.
Special thanks to BdoubleO for his video at the mob farm, and for him just being him.
